price: Hingga apabila mereka datang, Allah berfirman, "Apakah kamu telah mendustakan ayat-ayat-Ku, padahal ilmu kamu tidak meliputinya 1110 atau apakah yang telah kamu kerjakan?"
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُو قَالَ أَكَذَّبۡتُم بِـَٔايَٰتِي وَلَمۡ تُحِيطُواْ بِهَا عِلۡمًا أَمَّاذَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: 1110.  Maksudnya, orang-orang musyrik Arab mendustakan ayat-ayat Allah tanpa memikirkannya lebih dahulu.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā jāū qāla akadhabtum biāyātī walam tuḥīṭū bihā ʿil'man ammādhā kuntum taʿmalūna
